main event: The document contains various records, reports, and charts related to a UFO sighting at Whiteman AFB, Missouri, on November 6, 1957.
interesting points: The sighting reported a bright light changing color from red to blue to white and back to red, moving slowly for 10 minutes.
Efforts were made to analyze radar reports and photographs to determine the truth about rumors of unidentified aerial objects, but considerable speculation remained regarding the sightings.
Radar tracking data described erratic maneuvers, sharp turns, and changes in speed beyond the capabilities of existing aircraft.
The photographic evidence included a radar photo of a UFO target, but the photographs taken in sequence of the UFO sighting were of poor quality.
The reports were analyzed and classified as unexplained due to the unusual behavior and performance of the observed objects.
sighted object: bright light changing color from red to blue to white and back to red
photographs: yes, photographs were included in the report but were of poor quality
